title: Delete a Branch
description: In this lab, you will learn how to delete a branch in a Git repository, which is a common task for managing feature development and maintaining a clean and organized codebase.

meta.title: Deleting Branches in Git: A Straightforward Guide
meta.description: Learn how to delete branches in Git to keep your repository clean and organized.
meta.keywords: repository, delete, git labs, branch, git, management, git playground

verify.name: Verify that the branch has been deleted
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.

i18n.title: 删除分支
i18n.description: 在本实验中，你将学习如何在 Git 仓库中删除分支，这是管理功能开发以及维护干净、有序代码库的常见任务。

meta.title: Git 中删除分支：简明指南
meta.description: 学习如何在 Git 中删除分支，以保持你的仓库干净且有序。
meta.keywords: 仓库, 删除, Git 实验室, 分支, Git, 管理, Git 演练场

verify.name: 验证分支是否已被删除
